Cayli Enderton (EVCS Class of 2015) is a Freshman writing major at Buffalo State College. She is also an active part of the Just Buffalo Literacy Center. Cayli, whose pen name is Sage, has been going to the JBLC since she was an 8th grader at EVCS. Ms. DeRonda, the 8th grade ELA teacher, invited the JBLC to speak to our students about joining other teenage writers from the area at the center. Students heard Caylis story and then participated in an interactive writing activity. Robin Jordan, a coordinator at the JBLC, told Days Park faculty members how impressed she was with our community of writers!
